subtitle: This is a good centre-piece for a buffet party.

method.text: Roll out 275 g of the shortcrust pastry to line the base and sides of a 18cm deep sided, loose bottomed cake tin.
Sprinkle the pastry with ground rice. Cut the ham to fit the base of the pie. Add the whole eggs and sprinkle the cranberries around them.

In a bowl, mix the chicken, mustard, seasoning and stock together. Press the chicken mixture over the eggs to form a dome shape. Roll out the remaining pastry for the lid. Glaze the edges. Cover the pie with the remaining pastry and seal well. Use any pastry trimmings to decorate the top.
Make a hole in the centre of the pie. Glaze the top. Bake for 30 min then reduce heat to 180°C and cook for a further 60-90 min.
Remove from oven and leave to cool in the tin for 1 hour. Chill well before cutting into wedges.

title: Cranberry chicken and ham pie
